com.acme.exporter

Class MSExporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acme.exporter.Exporter
      • com.acme.exporter.MSExporter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MSSubExporter

    public class MSExporter
extends Exporter
    A specialized version of Exporter that exports a grid generated by an object of the Organizer class.
